Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In a nutshell the people of Australia are currently undergoing the struggles of increasing costs of living and rising interest rates. However thereâ€™s hope in the upcoming federal budget. Treasurer Jim Chalmers and the Albanese Government have proposed financial relief for struggling families allocating additional funds on childcare assistance and other social aids. Moreover the number of people receiving Jobseeker payments has increased tremendously which may prompt government officials to offer payment boosts for those that belong to the vulnerable demographic.
